permissions.photoLibrary: We need access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload profile pictures. Your photos will not be shared without your consent.
permissions.locationAlways: We use your location to give real-time updates of where you are to your friends. You can easily turn off location tracking by turning your beacon off on the map page.

plugins.photosPermission: We need access to your photo library to allow you to select and upload profile pictures. Your photos will not be shared without your consent.
